query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_accounts, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'active' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active_accounts,
       SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'pending' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_accounts,
       SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as failed_accounts
FROM accounts;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3acLf9NzZ7hRWmZ.d99a3ea649fd --database 6jtzrVB6wF9khFezaTmFpE --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total_accounts, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'active' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as active_accounts,
       SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'pending' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_accounts,
       SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as failed_accounts
FROM accounts;
